<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Adapt Self](/Spells.aspx?ID=594)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You make subtle changes to yourself to adapt to the situation. Choose one of the following options that applies to you.

-  If you are in water, you gain a swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
-  If you are in water, you become able to breathe water.
-  If it’s too dark for you to see, you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
-  If you are in an environment of [severe heat or severe cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642), you are protected from the effects of severe heat or severe cold, and the spell lasts 10 minutes.
name: Adapt Self
